site.title: Activist Checklist
site.description: Plain language steps for digital security, because protecting yourself helps keep your whole community safer.

desc.security-essentials: Core security practices every activist should follow.
desc.protest-prep: Digital security for anyone attending a protest.
desc.travel: Digital security practices for activists traveling.
desc.signal: Secure your Signal messaging app for safer communications.
desc.secondary-phone: Set up an extra phone for activism and protests.
desc.emergency: Establish an emergency support network in case you're detained or threatened.
desc.spyware: Protect yourself from spyware and surveillance software.
desc.research: How to conduct research and browse the web anonymously.
desc.federal: Digital security guidance for federal employees.
